<div class="col-md-10">**We're thrilled that you're here!** On this site, you will find everything you need to help you navigate through your (virtual) Prospective Visit Days with the [Columbia University Psychology Department](https://psychology.columbia.edu/){target="_blank"}. 

If any questions arise, please feel free to reach out to us anytime, either by using our [Slack channel](https://join.slack.com/t/cu-prospectives-2022/shared_invite/zt-11arqkc7r-oclGLi3pWiVqVb4cssor1Q){target="_blank"}, or by contacting one of the Prospective Visit Days coordinators via email: [Camille  Gasser](mailto:cg3083@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}, [Jiawen Huang](mailto:jh4290@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}, and [Daniel Yonas](mailto:dy2415@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}.
